resources.string: Only Pixel 2 and Pixel 2 XL devices can be audited.
Camera permission is required to scan QR codes. Please try again.
Now scan this QR Code from the other device.
Now scan this QR Code from the other device.\n\nThis is the initial pairing and needs to be completed or pairings will need to be cleared on either side to try again.
Now scan this QR Code from the other device.\n\nTap after scanning to proceed.
Scan QR code shown on the other device.
